trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps

trans-unit.source: Analyze usage and performance of your Windows device app with Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Analyze usage and performance of your Windows device app with Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: [AZURBLAU.
trans-unit.target: [AZURBLAU.

trans-unit.source: ENTHALTEN <link><linkText>app-insights-selector-get-started</linkText><title></title></link>]
trans-unit.target: ENTHALTEN <link><linkText>app-insights-selector-get-started</linkText><title></title></link>]

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your published application for:
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your published application for:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>**Verwendung**[windowsusage]</linkText><title></title></link> - Learn how many users you have and what they are doing with your app.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>**Verwendung**[windowsusage]</linkText><title></title></link> - Learn how many users you have and what they are doing with your app.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>**Crashes**[windowscrash]</linkText><title></title></link> - Get diagnostic reports of crashes and understand their impact on users.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>**Crashes**[windowscrash]</linkText><title></title></link> - Get diagnostic reports of crashes and understand their impact on users.

trans-unit.source: For many application types, <link><linkText>Visual Studio can add Application Insights to your app</linkText><title></title></link> almost without you noticing.
trans-unit.target: For many application types, <link><linkText>Visual Studio can add Application Insights to your app</linkText><title></title></link> almost without you noticing.

trans-unit.source: But since you're reading this to get a better understanding of what's going on, we'll take you through the steps manually.
trans-unit.target: But since you're reading this to get a better understanding of what's going on, we'll take you through the steps manually.

trans-unit.source: You'll need:
trans-unit.target: You'll need:

trans-unit.source: A subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure[azure]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: A subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure[azure]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2013 or later.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2013 or later.

trans-unit.source: 1. Create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: 1. Create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: In the <link><linkText>Azure portal[portal]</linkText><title></title></link>, create a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: In the <link><linkText>Azure portal[portal]</linkText><title></title></link>, create a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Choose New, Developer Services, Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Choose New, Developer Services, Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: A <link><linkText>resource[roles]</linkText><title></title></link> in Azure is an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: A <link><linkText>resource[roles]</linkText><title></title></link> in Azure is an instance of a service.

trans-unit.source: This resource is where telemetry from your app will be analyzed and presented to you.
trans-unit.target: This resource is where telemetry from your app will be analyzed and presented to you.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Instrumentation Key
trans-unit.target: Copy the Instrumentation Key

trans-unit.source: The key identifies the resource.
trans-unit.target: The key identifies the resource.

trans-unit.source: You'll need it soon, to configure the SDK to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: You'll need it soon, to configure the SDK to send the data to the resource.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Open the Essentials drop-down drawer and select the instrumentation key</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Open the Essentials drop-down drawer and select the instrumentation key</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 2. Add the Application Insights SDK to your apps
trans-unit.target: 2. Add the Application Insights SDK to your apps

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, add the appropriate SDK to your project.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, add the appropriate SDK to your project.

trans-unit.source: If it's a Windows Universal app, repeat the steps for both the Windows Phone project and the Windows project.
trans-unit.target: If it's a Windows Universal app, repeat the steps for both the Windows Phone project and the Windows project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose Manage NuGet Packages.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose Manage NuGet Packages.

trans-unit.source: Search for "Application Insights".
trans-unit.target: Search for "Application Insights".

trans-unit.source: Pick Application Insights for Windows Applications
trans-unit.target: Pick Application Insights for Windows Applications

trans-unit.source: Add an ApplicationInsights.config file to the root of your solution and insert the instrumentation key copied from above.
trans-unit.target: Add an ApplicationInsights.config file to the root of your solution and insert the instrumentation key copied from above.

trans-unit.source: A sample xml for this config file is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample xml for this config file is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to mark the ApplicationInsights.config file Build Action to "Content" and Copy to Output Directory to "Copy always".
trans-unit.target: Make sure to mark the ApplicationInsights.config file Build Action to "Content" and Copy to Output Directory to "Copy always".

trans-unit.source: Add the following initilization code.
trans-unit.target: Add the following initilization code.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to add this code to the App() constructor.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended to add this code to the App() constructor.

trans-unit.source: If this initialization is not done in the app constructor, you may miss intiial auto collection of pageviews.
trans-unit.target: If this initialization is not done in the app constructor, you may miss intiial auto collection of pageviews.

trans-unit.source: Windows Universal apps: Repeat the steps for both the Phone and the Store project.
trans-unit.target: Windows Universal apps: Repeat the steps for both the Phone and the Store project.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Example of a Windows 8.1 Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Example of a Windows 8.1 Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>3. Enable network access for your app
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>3. Enable network access for your app

trans-unit.source: If your app doesn't already <link><linkText>request outgoing network access</linkText><title></title></link>, you'll have to add that to its manifest as a <link><linkText>required capability</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If your app doesn't already <link><linkText>request outgoing network access</linkText><title></title></link>, you'll have to add that to its manifest as a <link><linkText>required capability</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>4. Run your project
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>4. Run your project

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Run your application with F5</linkText><title></title></link> and use it, so as to generate some telemetry.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Run your application with F5</linkText><title></title></link> and use it, so as to generate some telemetry.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, you'll see a count of the events that have been received.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, you'll see a count of the events that have been received.

trans-unit.source: In debug mode, telemetry is sent as soon as it's generated.
trans-unit.target: In debug mode, telemetry is sent as soon as it's generated.

trans-unit.source: In release mode, telemetry is stored on the device and sent only when the app resumes.
trans-unit.target: In release mode, telemetry is stored on the device and sent only when the app resumes.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>5. See monitor data
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>5. See monitor data

trans-unit.source: Open Application Insights from your project.
trans-unit.target: Open Application Insights from your project.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Right-click your project and open the Azure portal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Right-click your project and open the Azure portal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: At first, you'll just see one or two points.
trans-unit.target: At first, you'll just see one or two points.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click through to more data</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click through to more data</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.
trans-unit.target: Click Refresh after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.

trans-unit.source: Click any chart to see more detail.
trans-unit.target: Click any chart to see more detail.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>5. Publish your application to Store
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>5. Publish your application to Store

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Publish your application</linkText><title></title></link> and watch the data accumulate as users download and use it.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Publish your application</linkText><title></title></link> and watch the data accumulate as users download and use it.

trans-unit.source: Customize your telemetry
trans-unit.target: Customize your telemetry

trans-unit.source: Choosing the collectors
trans-unit.target: Choosing the collectors

trans-unit.source: Application Insights SDK Includes several collectors, which collect different types of data from your app automatically.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights SDK Includes several collectors, which collect different types of data from your app automatically.

trans-unit.source: By default, they are all active.
trans-unit.target: By default, they are all active.

trans-unit.source: But you can choose which collectors to initialize in the app constructor:
trans-unit.target: But you can choose which collectors to initialize in the app constructor:

trans-unit.source: Send your own telemetry data
trans-unit.target: Send your own telemetry data

trans-unit.source: Nutzung der <link><linkText>API[api]</linkText><title></title></link> to send events, metrics and diagnostic data to Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Nutzung der <link><linkText>API[api]</linkText><title></title></link> to send events, metrics and diagnostic data to Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: In summary:
trans-unit.target: In summary:

trans-unit.source: For more detail, see <link><linkText>Custom Events and Metrics[api]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more detail, see <link><linkText>Custom Events and Metrics[api]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: What's next?
trans-unit.target: What's next?

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Detect and diagnose crashes in your app[windowscrash]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Detect and diagnose crashes in your app[windowscrash]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn about metrics[metrics]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn about metrics[metrics]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn about diagnostic search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn about diagnostic search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Automated setup
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Automated setup

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to let Visual Studio perform the setup steps, you can do that with Windows Phone, Windows Store, and many other types of apps.
trans-unit.target: If you prefer to let Visual Studio perform the setup steps, you can do that with Windows Phone, Windows Store, and many other types of apps.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> If you're creating a new Windows app project ...
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> If you're creating a new Windows app project ...

trans-unit.source: Select Application Insights in the New Project dialog.
trans-unit.target: Select Application Insights in the New Project dialog.

trans-unit.source: If you're asked to sign in, use the credentials for your Azure account (which is separate from your Visual Studio Online account).
trans-unit.target: If you're asked to sign in, use the credentials for your Azure account (which is separate from your Visual Studio Online account).

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> Or if it's an existing project ...
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> Or if it's an existing project ...

trans-unit.source: Add Application Insights from Solution Explorer.
trans-unit.target: Add Application Insights from Solution Explorer.

trans-unit.source: To upgrade to a new release of the SDK
trans-unit.target: To upgrade to a new release of the SDK

trans-unit.source: When a <link><linkText>new SDK version is released</linkText><title></title></link>:
trans-unit.target: When a <link><linkText>new SDK version is released</linkText><title></title></link>:

trans-unit.source: Right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet Packages.
trans-unit.target: Right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet Packages.

trans-unit.source: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Action: Upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Action: Upgrade.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Die nächsten Schritte
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Die nächsten Schritte

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Detect and diagnose crashes in your app[windowscrash]</linkText><title></title></link>
